ygData.subject: Re: Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow such a warm welcome! I ve started 3 toons I normally play. Galornna....druid, Maerdan.....Necro, and Gollack SK. Of the 3 The Necro is my favorite, and
ygData.messageBody:
Wow such a warm welcome! I've started 3 toons I normally play.
Galornna....druid, Maerdan.....Necro, and Gollack SK. Of the 3 The
Necro is my favorite, and always has been. If ya'all see me out send
me a tell. The Necro will mor than likely be my main.


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Thomas Houseman" <thomas@...> wrote:
>
> Send a tell to Tuvarilo, I'll help you out with some plat etc.
>
> T.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: gollackdeathreaper
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2007 7:38 AM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
>
>
> Wow it's nice to see that the servers are still active. I will start a
> newbie toon on Drinal then.
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, David Kahan <trekkie61@> wrote:

> >

as the

activity
